column4: how can i use command line to batch process files in an input-file output-file?
what exactly do you want to do?
i am using mencoder to conver an mkv file to avi. i want to modify the command to convert all the mkv file in a directory
wildcards work with input, but i don't know what to use for output
something like 'for each vid in *.mkv; do mencoder "$vid" options "$vid.avi"; done'
vid here is a dummy argument ?
what do you mean dummy argument?
i mean it will be replaced with the name of the file in each run
i will try this on a different command, since mencoder takes a long time in each run
it just gives me ">" and i press ctrl-c to exit
sorry, it worked. i forgot ";done" on the first try
the "$name" has the name and extension
yes it does in the example i gave
that can be removed with something like ${name%.*}.avi
